component.text: 1. <textformat blockindent='13'>The XYZ corporation designs and manufactures complex electronic circuit boards for use in aircraft. What kind of computer would be best suited for the design work?</textformat>

2. <textformat blockindent='13'>Mario is purchasing a computer for his family. They will need word processor and spreadsheet applications and want to play DVDs. What kind of computer would best suit their need?</textformat>

3. <textformat blockindent='13'>The Animatics company develops virtual reality simulation software for the gaming industry. What kind of computer would be best for developing this software?</textformat>

4. <textformat blockindent='13'>ABC Inc. just hired 10 new help desk employees to support network end users. The help desk people will need to run basic office applications as well as a help desk problem reporting application. What kind of computer would be best for this type of work?</textformat>

5. <textformat blockindent='13'>Mana's mail order business has grown significantly and she needs a new computer to host her web site. She is expecting significant number of web clients to access the computer daily. She also wants to use the computer for centralized file storage and for employee Email. What kind of computer would best suit her needs?</textformat>

Activity

Identify if the computer is acting as a server, a workstation, or a desktop for each scenario.

Click the appropriate role of server, workstation or desktop.
Correct, you successfully identified the correct type of computer for each scenario. Click Next to continue.
Incorrect, review the purpose of the server, workstation and desktop computers and try again.
